author: ajsutton
content: FYI: We plan to shut down the ConsenSys Medalla nodes this week.

author: prestonvanloon
content: Same for Prysmatic Labs. We still have ours online, but will likely turn them down over the weekend

author: paulhauner
content: Sigma Prime will also do the same.

author: ajsutton
content: We may do some experiments with some of our systems automation first which involves testing some not-expected-to-be-perfect safety protections against system automation getting  us slashed. It will be useful to know precisely where the limits are so don't be surprised if we go out with a bang...
